name: Say No To Pot
description:
You are a crab, set loose in a seafood kitchen. Evade the chef and his pot for as long as you can! There are probably a few hiding spots you could try....

Use W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys to move

-----------------------------------------------------------

'Say No To Pot' was made in one week for the Weekly Game Jam 162 (Aug. 14 - Aug. 20).

Theme: 'Crabs'
